argument.name: value
argument.description: The value defined in the a5-value attribute for the element.

argument.name: className
argument.description: CSS className to remove from the element.

page.description: Remove the CSS class from an element with the specified value.
page.example: var vbObj = {dialog.object}.getControl('MYVIEWBOX1'); //get pointer to the ViewBox vbObj.removeElementClass('MA','red');
